BreadcrumbHomePermitting Under the Clean Air ActCAA Permitting in South DakotaClean Air Act permitting in South Dakota is the responsibility of the Air Quality Program of the South Dakota Department of Environment & Natural Resources.Responsible AreaStatewide, except in Indian Country, whereEPA Region 8is the permitting authorityAgency OfficeAir Quality ProgramSouth Dakota Department of Agriculture & Natural ResourcesJoe Foss Building, 523 E.
